itemInfo.itemDesc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Bottle of Sea Water
item.desc: Water Gathered from the sea using an Empty Bottle. It can be modified, or used as an ingredient in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: Sea Water can be obtained by using an Empty Bottle by the sea.

item.name: Butter
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be created by Shaking salt with the cream obtained from Shaking milk.\n\n- Usage: Cheese Pie, Seafood Grilled with Butter

item.name: Refined Herbal Juice
item.desc: MP/WP/SP is recovered by 325.\n- Cooldown time: 6 sec.\n- It is lighter than an ordinary potion.

item.name: Highly Concentrated Herbal Juice
item.desc: Immediately heals MP/WP/SP by +250.\n- Cooldown: 6 sec\n- It weighs less than normal potion.

item.name: Concentrated Herbal Juice
item.desc: Immediately heals MP/WP/SP by +175.\n- Cooldown: 6 sec\n- It weighs less than normal potion.
